summary.para: The MSV1_0_SUBAUTH_REQUEST structure contains information to pass to a subauthentication package.

member.name: MSV1_0_SUBAUTH_REQUEST.MessageType
member.summary: value identifying the type of request being made. This member should be set to MsV1_0SubAuth for local subauthentication and MsV1_0GenericPassthrough for subauthentication on the domain controller.

member.name: MSV1_0_SUBAUTH_REQUEST.SubAuthPackageId
member.summary: Contains a subauthentication package identifier. The value of subauthentication package identifiers is established by the creator of the subauthentication package.

member.name: MSV1_0_SUBAUTH_REQUEST.SubAuthInfoLength
member.summary: Indicates the length, in bytes, of the buffer passed to the subauthentication package in SubAuthSubmitBuffer.

member.name: MSV1_0_SUBAUTH_REQUEST.SubAuthSubmitBuffer
member.summary: Containing the data to pass to the subauthentication package. The format and content of this data is specific to the subauthentication package. For more information, see the documentation for specific subauthentication packages.
